desc: SwapTriplePos-Age is a transformation method specially designed for age relation. It paraphrases the sentence and keeps the original age relation between the entity pairs.

examples.ori: Allen waits was also convicted of illegal drug activity , and bribing police to turn a blind eye to her crimes , earlier press reports said , and he was 46 year old at that time .
examples.trans: Allen waits , 46 , was also convicted of illegal drug activity , and bribing police to turn a blind eye to her crimes , earlier press reports said .

examples.ori: Jupp , 46 , worked for the military 's forensic explosive laboratory and suffered severe burns when a crude bomb spontaneously exploded during the tests on Aug. 14 , 2002 .
examples.trans: Jupp worked for the military 's forensic explosive laboratory and suffered severe burns when a crude bomb spontaneously exploded during the tests on Aug. 14 , 2002 , and he was 46 year old at that time .
